org.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_all, custom_field_id AS custom_field_id FROM custom_fields INNER JOIN custom_fields_projects ON custom_fields_projects.custom_field_id = custom_fields.id INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = custom_fields_projects.project_id WHERE custom_fields.type IN ('IssueCustomField') AND custom_fields.is_for_all = "$1" GROUP BY custom_field_id

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_all, custom_field_id AS custom_field_id FROM custom_fields INNER JOIN custom_fields_projects ON custom_fields_projects.custom_field_id = custom_fields.id WHERE custom_fields.type IN ('IssueCustomField') AND custom_fields.is_for_all = "$1" GROUP BY custom_field_id
